trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGLA401_04989_SEQ_00<tab>The greying gatherer is eyeing you with an impressed look.

TEXT_KINGLA401_04989_SEQ_01<tab>The grizzled gatherer stops you to explain that his days of gathering have come to an end and encourages you to take his place at Shunye's Apothecary. Although he is scarce on the details, he pledges that working for the shop will be a pleasant and fruitful experience. Shunye's Apothecary can be found at the far end of the marketplace, and the proprietor is always there to speak with customers─or prospective talent.

TEXT_KINGLA401_04989_SEQ_02<tab>Shunye greets you warmly and tells you about his shop─an apothecary which sells stones and plants that promote a healthy body. He explains a recent lack of proper materials has caused business to stagnate but then brightens when you offer your services. Your conversation is interrupted by the arrival of a Viera who introduces himself as Uvlo, who explains that he has traveled from Othard to learn about the Shetona tribe. Sensing an end to his troubles, Shunye proposes a test of your respective abilities. May you gather the best of what Tural has to offer!
TEXT_KINGLA401_04989_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Shunye.
TEXT_KINGLA401_04989_OLDLAND04989_000_000<tab>You're a <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> who plucks the finest of the land's offerings with their own hands. Am I right?
TEXT_KINGLA401_04989_OLDLAND04989_000_001<tab>Ah hah, I knew it the moment I set eyes upon you! I share the same passion, in fact...or at least, I used to.
TEXT_KINGLA401_04989_OLDLAND04989_000_002<tab>For many happy years did I work in the employ of Shunye's Apothecary, gathering only specimens of the utmost quality.

TEXT_KINGLA401_04989_OLDLAND04989_000_003<tab>Alas, such work wears on the body, and mine has about had its fill. Every day my knees and back make new cries of protest, so I have finally decided to leave this business to younger hands.

TEXT_KINGLA401_04989_OLDLAND04989_000_004<tab>And yours look fit to succeed me─maybe even surpass me! I reckon you'd fill my old position at Shunye's Apothecary nicely. You <var 1A 02 /var>will<var 1A 01 /var> fill it, won't you?

TEXT_KINGLA401_04989_OLDLAND04989_100_004<tab>I'd hate for Shunye to man his shop alone while Tuliyollal is enduring such troubled times. Consider the opportunity─I promise you'd be hard-pressed to find a better man to work for!

TEXT_KINGLA401_04989_OLDLAND04989_000_005<tab>I'd hate for Shunye to be left alone to prop up such a bustling business. Consider the opportunity─I promise you'd be hard-pressed to find a better man to work for!
TEXT_KINGLA401_04989_OLDLAND04989_000_006<tab>You can find him at the far end of the marketplace. At least go and see what he's about, will you?
TEXT_KINGLA401_04989_SHUNYE_000_010<tab>Oh, hello there. Apologies for not noticing you─a merchant's work is endless, you see, and I find myself shorthanded these days.
TEXT_KINGLA401_04989_SHUNYE_000_011<tab>Welcome to Shunye's Apothecary, friend.
TEXT_KINGLA401_04989_SHUNYE_000_012<tab>Are you searching for something specific? Perhaps one of my displays caught your eye?
TEXT_KINGLA401_04989_SHUNYE_000_013<tab>Heh... I've seen that look before. You're wondering just what sort of shop this is.

TEXT_KINGLA401_04989_SHUNYE_000_014<tab>To put it simply, I purvey in goods which promote a healthy body and mind. Herbs to cleanse mild ailments, incense to calm the senses, stones to massage aching shoulders, and much more, as you can see.

TEXT_KINGLA401_04989_SHUNYE_000_015<tab>Naturally, this requires the use of various plants and minerals which possess uncommon─and some would even say mystical─properties, which I acquire from discerning and trusted gatherers.

TEXT_KINGLA401_04989_SHUNYE_000_016<tab>However, the flow of goods has recently slowed to a trickle, and I've found it difficult to keep my shelves stocked. You may find my selection somewhat wanting, if I'm being honest.
TEXT_KINGLA401_04989_SHUNYE_000_017<tab>So you must be the gatherer Ropli spoke of... Are you here to offer your services?
TEXT_KINGLA401_04989_SHUNYE_000_018<tab>Of course, I'm more than grateful for the help. I hope this is the start of a mutually pleasant relationship, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
TEXT_KINGLA401_04989_UVLO_000_019<tab>(-???-)Excuse me, but are you the proprietor of this shop? Is it true you are of the Shetona tribe?
TEXT_KINGLA401_04989_SHUNYE_000_020<tab>Yes, on both counts. What brings you to Shunye's Apothecary, friend?
TEXT_KINGLA401_04989_UVLO_000_021<tab>I am Uvlo Gahjewesfv. I hail from the village of Kuguma, located on the eastern continent of Othard.
TEXT_KINGLA401_04989_UVLO_000_022<tab>I was traveling the Three Great Continents in an effort to expand my horizons, when I learned of a peoples similar to the Viera who live in Tural.

TEXT_KINGLA401_04989_UVLO_000_023<tab>I wished to learn all I could of them, so I boarded the first ship across the sea I could find. Once at port, I asked where I might find any Shetona, and was pointed here.
TEXT_KINGLA401_04989_UVLO_000_024<tab>Please, allow me to serve you. I can hunt, I can fight, and I can gather─surely one of my skills can be of use.
TEXT_KINGLA401_04989_UVLO_000_025<tab>All I ask in return is that you teach me of your people!
TEXT_KINGLA401_04989_SHUNYE_000_026<tab>What a day this has turned out to be. One moment desperate for help, the next spoiled for choice...

TEXT_KINGLA401_04989_SHUNYE_000_027<tab>Uvlo, was it? I know you've come far, and I can sense your sincerity. But my conversation doesn't fetch so high a price─simply purchase one of my wares and we can chat for as long as you like.
TEXT_KINGLA401_04989_UVLO_000_028<tab>I...have no money.
TEXT_KINGLA401_04989_UVLO_000_029<tab>Not even a single coin. I spent my very last one hiring a ship to bring me here.
TEXT_KINGLA401_04989_SHUNYE_000_030<tab>Ah. Then I can't very well expect your custom, can I?

TEXT_KINGLA401_04989_SHUNYE_000_031<tab>Apologies for the interruption, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Where were we...? Ah, yes. Would you agree to a small test of your talents before we begin our work in earnest?
TEXT_KINGLA401_04989_SHUNYE_000_032<tab>I suppose I'll be testing you, too. That is, of course, assuming you still wish to work with me.
TEXT_KINGLA401_04989_UVLO_000_033<tab>Of course! I am at your disposal─you only need tell me what to do!
TEXT_KINGLA401_04989_SHUNYE_000_034<tab>Then your task is simple: bring me goods that I can sell to eager customers! There's no better way to take stock of your talents.
TEXT_KINGLA401_04989_SYSTEM_000_035<tab>You may now undertake deliveries for Shunye's Apothecary at Wachumeqimeqi. Speak to Shunye to learn more.
